H0.text: Who's home runs record did Mark McGwire break in the 1998 season. Babe Ruth

H1.text: Who's home runs record did Mark McGwire break in the 1998 season. Hank Aaron

H2.text: Who's home runs record did Mark McGwire break in the 1998 season. Mickey Mantle

H3.text: Who's home runs record did Mark McGwire break in the 1998 season. Roger Maris

A4.text: Maris's single-season MLB home run record was broken by Mark McGwire, who hit 70 in 1998.
